commits.content:
Nexus Tech

Full Portfolio

More Projects

Explore our complete portfolio of games, web applications, mobile apps, and digital solutions. From concept to launch, we bring visions to life.

Web Development Mobile Apps Game Development Digital Solutions
$25 Consultation

Request Your Project

Ready to bring your vision to life? Tell us about your project and book a strategic 45-minute consultation to discuss your digital solution.

Project Request Received! 🚀

Thank you for your interest! We've received your project details and will review them shortly.

Next Step: Review Our Services & Pricing

Before booking your consultation, take a look at our service offerings and starting prices to help prepare for our strategy session.


This will help you choose the right service for your project discussion.

We'll also send you a confirmation email with next steps and preparation materials.

Nexus Tech Digital Solutions

Service List & Starting Prices

Review our services below, then book your $25 consultation to discuss your specific needs.

1. Pre-Made Website & App Templates

Starting at $995
Launch: 21 days Support: 14 days free

Perfect for: Startups, solo entrepreneurs, coaches, content creators, and product-based businesses who need a professional online presence without the high cost of custom development.

What's included:
  • Mobile-friendly website or app using our premium in-house templates
  • SEO-ready pages for visibility
  • 1 design revision
  • 14 days of technical support after launch
Client Benefits:
  • Faster launch without sacrificing quality
  • Beautiful, clean design tailored to your brand
  • Peace of mind with built-in post-launch support
  • Affordable investment to build your digital presence

2. Custom Software & App Development

Starting at $3,500
Timeline: Based on project scope

Perfect for: Businesses, agencies, or tech-forward brands who need a completely unique digital solution or platform to serve their clients or teams.

What's included:
  • Full discovery session + tech planning
  • Custom design and development
  • Frontend, backend, and database setup
  • MVP or full product build
Client Benefits:
  • Fully custom-built to match your exact needs
  • You own the code and IP
  • Designed for scale, security, and future growth
  • A dedicated developer (you'll work directly with our founder)

3. Platform Integration (Shopify, Squarespace, BigCommerce)

Starting at $600
Timeline: 7–10 days

Perfect for: Product-based businesses, boutiques, and ecommerce startups who want a store setup or refresh.

What's included:
  • Website/storefront setup or redesign
  • Mobile optimization
  • Template styling and basic branding
  • 1 marketing automation (email or product flow)
Client Benefits:
  • Save hours figuring out complex setup
  • Launch a functional, branded store fast
  • Seamless user experience that increases conversions
  • Great starting point to grow your online sales

4. Tech Startup Strategy Session

$185
Session: 60 minutes max (Zoom or Google Meet)

Perfect for: Founders, creators, or entrepreneurs with a business idea or existing platform who need help figuring out tech, launch plans, or app development strategy.

What's included:
  • 1-on-1 strategy call
  • Post-call action plan & recommendations
  • Personalized advice on tech stacks, funding, and digital product ideas
Client Benefits:
  • Clarity on your next tech step
  • Save thousands by avoiding the wrong platforms
  • Get expert feedback before you build
  • Walk away with a roadmap — not confusion

5. Monthly Technical Support Plan

Starting at $340/month
Minimum: 4 hours/month

Perfect for: Clients with existing websites, apps, or systems who need ongoing updates, fixes, or support without hiring a full-time tech team.

What's included:
  • Up to 4 hours of monthly support
  • Frontend + backend fixes or updates
  • Plugin, content, or integration maintenance
  • Priority response within 24–48 hours
  • Monthly status report
Client Benefits:
  • Keep your systems running smoothly
  • Avoid bugs, downtime, and security issues
  • Access to expert help when you need it
  • No contracts — pay month-to-month

Ready to Discuss Your Project?

Now that you've seen our services, let's have a focused discussion about your specific needs and create a custom proposal.

📅 Book Your $25 Strategy Session

$25 consultation fee is applied toward your project if you proceed

  • 45-minute strategy consultation ($25)
  • Custom project proposal & timeline
  • Technology recommendations
  • Transparent pricing breakdown
  • Expert team introduction
  • $25 applied toward project if you proceed
